summary: Completed testing of Badges and Rewards tabs in Incentives Admin Console. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all 6 tabs work correctly with proper CRUD dialogs.
critical_code_review_comments: All CRUD endpoints for badges and rewards are working correctly
GET /api/incentives/badges/definitions - Returns list of badges, auto-seeds defaults if empty
POST /api/incentives/badges - Creates new badge with validation
GET /api/incentives/rewards - Returns list of rewards, auto-seeds defaults if empty
POST /api/incentives/rewards - Creates new reward with validation
All 6 tabs (Competitions, Templates, Seasons, Badges, Rewards, Metrics) navigate correctly
Badge form has live preview with tier-based styling
Reward form supports multiple types (gift_card, merchandise, experience, cash, pto, points, custom)
data-testid attributes properly implemented for form fields and tabs
seed_data_creation: Backend auto-seeds 6 default badges (First Harvest, Ten Down, On Fire, Closer, Streak Master, Harvest Legend) and 5 default rewards ($25 Amazon Gift Card, $50 Amazon Gift Card, $100 Cash Bonus, Half Day PTO, Company Hoodie) if collections are empty.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Badges and Rewards CRUD fully functional. All endpoints tested: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE for both /api/incentives/badges and /api/incentives/rewards. Frontend tabs all working with proper dialogs. Default data auto-seeds on first access.

GET /api/incentives/badges/definitions.details: Returns list of badge definitions. Auto-seeds 6 default badges if collection is empty.

POST /api/incentives/badges.details: Creates new badge. Requires name and criteria. Supports all tiers (common, rare, epic, legendary).

PUT /api/incentives/badges/{id}.details: Updates existing badge. Returns 404 for non-existent badge.

DELETE /api/incentives/badges/{id}.details: Deletes badge. Returns 404 for non-existent badge.

GET /api/incentives/rewards.details: Returns list of rewards. Supports active_only filter. Auto-seeds 5 default rewards if empty.

POST /api/incentives/rewards.details: Creates new reward. Supports all types (gift_card, merchandise, experience, cash, pto, points, custom).

PUT /api/incentives/rewards/{id}.details: Updates existing reward. Returns 404 for non-existent reward.

DELETE /api/incentives/rewards/{id}.details: Deletes reward. Returns 404 for non-existent reward.

Tab Navigation.details: All 6 tabs (Competitions, Templates, Seasons, Badges, Rewards, Metrics) navigate correctly and load content.

Badges Tab UI.details: Shows badge cards with tier styling, edit/delete buttons, New Badge dialog with live preview.

Rewards Tab UI.details: Shows reward cards with type badges, Featured indicator, edit/delete buttons, New Reward dialog.
